description: Developing national capacities to address HIV/AIDS in Yemen

subproject.description:
The following are the main deliverable planned under the current programme:
1. Data collection, analysis and report writing for HIV/AIDS surveillance amount Tuberculosis patients,
2. Adapt World Health Organization IMAI training curriculum and develop national IMAI curriculum,
3. Conduct KAP studies among general population, vulnerable groups 
4. Review the national antiretroviral treatment guidelines to reflect eh new issues and the lesson learned
5. Develop culture sensitive National Behavior Change communication strategy
6. Capacity building plan to strengthen Ministry of Public Health / National AIDS Programme and the national population council capacity in planning/programmatic, finance management and M&E
7. Launch three new ART centers in TAIZ, Mukalla and Hodiedah and launch 10 Voluntary Counseling and testing sites in three governorates
8. Develop mass media tool kit on HIV/AIDS and conduct evaluation survey of the radio spots for the audience in nine governorates
9. Re-structure the National task force and redefine its functions
10. Programme progress reports including reports on conducted training activities.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: HIV/AIDS build national capaci
